events.title: Zach Hood
events.location: Tuscaloosa, Alabama, United States Of America
events.description: BOX OFFICE SALES AND VENUE DOORS OPEN ONE HOUR PRIOR TO TICKET TIME. NO WILL CALL. MUST BE 16 AND UNDER WITH PARENT/GAURDIAN OR 18+ TO ENTER. TICKET HOLDERS MUST HAVE VALID PHOTO ID. BOX OFFICE IS CREDIT CARD ONLY.
